title: ‘Jewellery worth £5k was stolen from my suitcase on a TUI cruise’
text:
Has a company treated you unfairly? Our consumer champion, Katie Morley, is here to help. For how to contact her click here.

Dear Katie,

My daughter and her husband went on a Marella Caribbean cruise earlier this year. On the last night, guests were asked to put their suitcases outside the cabin door before going to bed. Guests have no option but to do this.

The cases are taken from the ship to the airport by crew and guests do not see them again until they arrive on the carousel at the airport.

When she got home, my daughter unpacked her suitcase, and when she took her jewellery bag out, she discovered everything inside was gone. The value of the missing pieces is around £5,000.
